programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Inside The ER with Dr. Travis Stork
programme.desc: Get an inside look at real-life trauma and drama as The Doctors follows Dr. Travis into the E.R. And, The Triplets, whose baby girls are all approaching their first birthday, are back! Get the answers to their biggest new-mom questions!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Go inside the operating room with Dr. Ordon as he removes 10 pounds of sagging skin from a woman. And, find out why dead people want plastic surgery.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: My Nose Was Destroying My Life
programme.desc: A woman left deformed and devastated by a medical condition gets a new nose and a new lease on life! The Doctors debates a new ADHD medication for kids that tastes like candy! Can Botox be addictive? Find out! Plus, go inside the mind of a serial killer with a woman who was obsessed with one for years! The Doctors breaks down how many cups of coffee to drink to reduce your risk of Alzheimer’s. Is hitting the gym on the weekend enough to make a difference? Hear what science has to say!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: From stinky earwax to funky feet, The Doctors share solutions for the body issues you'd rather keep under wraps. Find fixes for nasty rashes, odor "down there" and more. Plus, "fifty shades of sex" secrets to try tonight!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Witness a first for daytime TV; a mother-to-be delivers her first child by c-section Live on The Doctors! Plus, learn your first line of defense against America’s number one killer, and what you need to know before your first time going under the knife.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Find out why so many women are removing their breast implants. Could breast implant illness be to blame? Are you your own worst enemy? Do you get in your own way? Psychologist Dr. Judy Ho breaks down how to “Stop Self-Sabotage!” Could your favorite Boba drink put you at risk for intestinal blockage? Who says self-care has to be expensive? Find out how to self-care on a budget!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: What’s causing that foul odor? That nagging itch? No matter how gross or unusual, The Doctors solve your most annoying body problems from head to toe.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors help diagnose your body’s most mysterious lumps and bumps. Learn the warning signs of eye, brain and oral cancer. Plus, it’s an unsightly growth that can mimic melanoma, and most people will develop it in their lifetime. Find out what it is and how to treat it.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Would You Know What to Do?
programme.desc: In an emergency, every second counts, and it could mean the difference between life and death. Get the vital information you need to know to avoid becoming a statistic. And, the everyday items that are toxic to kids.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Judge rules family can force feed daughter suffering from anorexia? Drug rehab at a chicken farm? Is this helping addicts or is it just a work camp? New body tightening procedure put to the test! Recipes for healthy indulgences with Lorna Jane! Then, could these disturbing skin conditions happen to you? What to look out for! The latest filler craze has people putting filler where? New secret to tackle toothaches!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Woman Amputates Leg to Save Baby
programme.desc: Inspiring story of a mom who decided to amputate her leg after a motorcycle crash to save her unborn baby. #DropTheSugar Dollar Store challenge proves you can eat healthy on a budget! Hundreds of women getting scammed with pregnancy congratulations cards? CBD vending machines coming to a convenience store near you!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: From diarrhea, to diabetes to dizziness, The Doctors dish on the most dreaded “D” words. And, does just thinking about the dentist make you feel anxious and scared? You may be suffering from dentophobia.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Live fast, die young, party all night – rock and roll’s infamous lifestyle is in the spotlight. Learn how to stay safe while you have fun! Plus, the daughter of shock rocker Alice Cooper shares stories from life on the road.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: In a THE DOCTORS exclusive, the family of 1st Lieutenant Katie Blanchard, the army nurse who was brutally set on fire by a coworker, sits down with our hosts to reveal details on the day that changed them forever. Then, cops conduct a cavity search, down there … over pot? The dash cam video that has one attorney calling “rape by cop.” And, a 4-year-old duct-taped to a chair … at day care? And, the Japanese therapy trend that has patients “return to the womb”? Plus, could breast milk be best … for bug bites?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: The Drs Set The Record Straight!
programme.desc: The Doctors debunk common health myths. Do dairy products really produce mucus? And how often should you really have a bowel movement? Plus, what actress Anne Heche wants you to know about sun protection. And, how robots are assisting weight loss.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Think a sore throat just means a cold or flu? It could be something much worse — find out! And what you SHOULD and SHOULDN’T’ be taking your pills with. Are you choosing correctly? Plus, banish back fat with an instant fix that’s sure to surprise you!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A cervical cancer test in the doctor's office is saving lives. See it performed live. And, Amanda lost 180 pounds, but excess skin and fat hung from her body. See The Total Body Lift surgery that allowed her to reclaim her life!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: If It's Not the Flu, What is It?
programme.desc: Learn the dangers of assuming symptoms like fatigue, coughs, stiff neck or fever mean the FLU; they COULD be caused by something else entirely! Plus, is your child contagious? When to keep your kid home from school.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: How Well Do You Know Your Body
programme.desc: Health education isn’t always fun and games, but it is on this episode of The Doctors! And, mommy correspondent Brooke Burke addresses your most challenging parenting questions.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Are you the picture of health? Learn how your personal photos, videos and voicemails could indicate a liver infection, digestive tract disorder, cancer and more. Plus, out-of-the-blue black and blues? Find out the meaning behind mysterious bruises.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: From middle-of-the-night gas to unwanted hair loss, find out how to remedy things you may hate about your health. And, simple, healthy recipes your family will love!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The number of teen pregnancies in the United States is skyrocketing at an alarming rate. Learn about the many options for girls who are pregnant, scared and alone. And, see an eyebrow transplant performed live!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: No Questions is a Stupid Question!
programme.desc: Get the answers you need, without all the embarrassment! From hair in strange places to brain-eating amoebas, The Doctors tackle the questions that matter to you. Plus, is driving while sick just as dangerous as drunk driving?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Buzz or Bust? Face-kinis? CBD coffee? “Period sex” blanket? Flavor of Love star shares healthy microwave recipes! Hack or Wack? Olive oil for pubic shaving? Wash face with sparkling water? 8-year old amputee has dreams of running! Meditate by cleaning? Drew Barrymore's tantrum tip!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Wild Ways to Look & Feel Great
programme.desc: The Doctors share the most extreme ways to look and feel great! Learn how to burn up to 1,000 calories in an hour, surf without getting wet and afford a Billion Dollar Brow Lift.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Learn why your food spoils faster than it should, how long an unsightly pimple will last and the maximum hours of TV your child should be watching. Plus, the most effective one-hour workout!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors investigates Hollywood’s Adderall epidemic. Former Hollywood “It-girl” says Adderall destroyed her life. What’s behind the increase in adult ADHD and is it a valid diagnosis? Safer alternatives for stimulant drugs. A procedure that gives a keyhole pout.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A family tragedy leads a woman to avoid medical attention for years! You won’t believe her total mouth makeover! A disorder that causes random swelling! A private part implant that’s a cheating alarm? How cravings reveal clues to your overall health! The toxic medicine and food combos you must avoid!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Do you wear “shower shoes”? If you don’t, you could be at risk for a horrible problem! And, a spider bite gone terribly wrong. We have the warning signs everyone must know! Then, a woman lost 100 pounds by doing sleep hypnosis! Could it work for you? And, a new anti-aging treatment that uses teenage blood to turn back the clock! Could this procedure create a black market for teen blood? Next, a woman catches fire while tweezing her eyebrows! What you can do to avoid it happening to you! And, a new cycle workout in a sauna? We’re putting it to the test! And, the top foods to stockpile in case of a natural disaster.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: What’s In Your Food & On Your Body
programme.desc: Is the food you’re eating safe? The Doctors investigate. Plus, learn how to decode your skin type, translate confusing medical jargon and more. Plus, groundbreaking tests for detecting breast cancer.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Live procedure: nasal implants for better breathing! Living your best life with Type 1 diabetes. How to get a superstar smile! Can eating 6 hardboiled eggs help you sleep? Dr. Judy’s tips to supercharge your creativity!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Contagious or Not? Are You at Risk
programme.desc: Find out the 10 most common ailments, and which ones are contagious. Plus, a dangerous virus that often masquerades as a rash. Is your child at risk? And, quick cures for urinary tract infections and the stomach flu.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Mysterious foot pains? Unexplained nosebleeds? The Doctors reveal what’s really causing your concerning symptoms. Plus, are you over or underspending on your health? Money guru Suze Orman has the answers.
